activities: Sys-Tech Solutions, Inc., d/b/a Systech International (“Systech”), may collect personal data from E.U. and Swiss residents who use certain features on the Systech website and store that data on its servers located in the U.S.  In addition, Systech stores the personal data of its E.U. employees and its E.U. job applicants on its U.S. servers.  In addition, Systech’s clients who use Systech’s Software-as-a-Service offering may collect personal data of E.U. residents and store that information on our servers located in the US.  In addition, Systech may collect personal data from E.U. and Swiss residents who use certain features of Systech’s mobile software applications, as may be provided by way of Apple, Inc.’s and Google Inc.’s mobile software application storefronts, and store that data on its servers located in the U.S.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Systech will cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate all unresolved complaints, regardless of the type of data involved.
